title: Info
body: Hi can someone tell me where I can get information on when skins are being given out for free or RP websites other than league news sometimes things are free but RIOT doesn't acknowledge them such as the free mad scientist ziggs skin hen you spend like $10 at eb games I messaged league about it and they said they don't know anything about it, so if there is a website that updates information about way to get free skins or rp please tell me in the comments much appreciated.
